actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit certain Federal agencies from requiring that any employee of such an agency receive a COVID-19 vaccine, and for other purposes.

subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Protecting Our Federal Workforce from Forced COVID-19 Vaccination Act

This bill prohibits federal agencies from requiring federal workers or contractors to receive a COVID-19 vaccine.
